short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search extension to get web and travel results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TripSearch provides Smart Search options for users and identify Travel related keywords in the Query to show appropriate results. 

This extension updates your browser default search settings in the following ways:
- Updates search experience directly from your browser address bar and New Tab 
- Extension provides smart results for your search queries. e.g. search for  "flight to San Francisco" or "hotels near me" and get results on Travel site instead of generic search results.

By installing this extension, you agree to the Terms of Service (https://tab.tripsearch-site.net/terms-of-service/) and Privacy Policy (https://tab.tripsearch-site.net/privacy-policy/) "
